name: rest-api
title: REST API Endpoint
description: Template for adding a new REST API endpoint with standard patterns

variables.name: method
variables.description: HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE)

variables.name: description
variables.description: Brief description of what the endpoint does

content:
# {{method}} {{endpoint}}

## Overview
{{description}}

## Requirements

### Endpoint Details
- **Method**: {{method}}
- **Path**: {{endpoint}}
- **Authentication**: {{auth_required}}

### Request
- Validate request body/parameters
- Handle missing/invalid fields with appropriate error messages
- Apply rate limiting if applicable

### Response
- Return appropriate HTTP status codes
- Include resource data in response body
- Handle errors with consistent error format

### Business Logic
- Implement {{resource}} business logic
- Validate business rules
- Handle edge cases

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] {{method}} {{endpoint}} endpoint is implemented
- [ ] Request validation works correctly
- [ ] Response format matches API standards
- [ ] Error handling is consistent
- [ ] Unit tests cover main scenarios
- [ ] Integration tests verify end-to-end flow

## Out of Scope
- Changes to other endpoints
- Database schema changes (unless required for this endpoint)
- UI changes
